item.description: The weather forcast looks good for Sunday.  I'll meet hikers at the Rufuge Headquarters at 9:45am and car pool from there or you can go right to the Rufuge and pay the $5 fee.  Meet me in parking lot #1 at 10am.  I plan on heading south towards Sandy Point for about three miles and returning.  That should take about three hours. The tide will be ebbing so the walk will be easier.  If you want a shorter walk just turn around any time you want.  I'd like to follow that up with hot chowder downtown Newburyport.  There's lots of choices.  There are a few places on Plum Island that we can also try.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Walk Plum Island Beach in the Parker River Rufuge, Parking Lot #1
